categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: This Imperial-class Star Destroyer was commanded by Captain Wankle during the Galactic Civil War. It patrolled near the planet Sullust, and conducted cargo inspections of ships entering and exiting the system.
The Star Destroyer first appeared in the story Bungo n' Rusti Get Carry-Out that appeared in the Star Wars Adventure Journal 11, written by Jim Anderson.
In material Anderson released on TheForce.Net, he revealed that the Star Destroyer was named the Excessive. However, no official source has confirmed this name.
